entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
